article_title: Churches now take plastic: Swipe kiosks allow for donations via credit card
article_text:
Giving Kiosk Ocean City Tabernacle President and CEO, Rick Carlson, shows Jane Szczepaniak of Ocean City, how to use the new giving kiosk at the the church. The Ocean City Tabernacle has a new giving kiosk in the lobby of the church, which allows visitors to church donations by electronic means. Wednesday July 09, 2014. (Dale Gerhard/Press of Atlantic City)

Giving Kiosk Ocean City Tabernacle President and CEO, Rick Carlson, stands next to the new giving kiosk at the the church. The Ocean City Tabernacle has a new giving kiosk in the lobby of the church, which allows visitors to church donations by electronic means. Wednesday July 09, 2014. (Dale Gerhard/Press of Atlantic City)

Giving Kiosk Ocean City Tabernacle President and CEO, Rick Carlson, stands next to the new giving kiosk at the the church. The Ocean City Tabernacle has a new giving kiosk in the lobby of the church, which allows visitors to church donations by electronic means. Wednesday July 09, 2014. (Dale Gerhard/Press of Atlantic City)

og.description: Americans may worship plastic, but, for the most part, they’re not yet willing to worship with plastic.
